messages.message: I set up a downstream integration in my deployment to be CSV written to an S3 bucket. The extension shows correctly as `.csv` in the file name, but when I download it it downloads as `.txt` . I think it's because the metadata shows `text/plain` as `Content-Type` instead of `text/csv`. Can we fix this to download as CSV? I'm on Chrome btw
Weird, seems like a bug. Can you file a ticket and assign to me? In the meantime, you can rename the file to have `.csv` and it works right?
